body: I am thinking it would be done easiest (and best) - by simply copying the "field headers" from "repo issue view" - which allows filtering on them ?

repository.name: gitea
repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

issue.body:
- Gitea version (or commit ref): 1.1.1+2-g2854c8a
- Git version: 2.12.2
- Operating system: Windows Server 2012
- Database (use `[x]`):
  - [x] MSSQL
- Can you reproduce the bug at https://try.gitea.io:
  - [x] Not relevant
- Log gist: Not relevant

Feature enhancement ideas for issue search: 
 - [ ] Indicators to show which filters are active (and clicking each to remove it)
 - [ ] Allow multiple filters (such as multiple labels, or both labels and assignees)
 - [ ] Negative filters ("no label", "no milestone", or "no assignee")
 - [ ] Exclude filters (show issues that do not match a selected label or assignee)

More:
- [x] https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/791
- [ ] https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/3409
- [x] https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/10777
- [ ] https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/11009
- [x] https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/25979
- [ ] https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/27195
- [ ] https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/27572
- [ ] https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/22899
- [x] https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/28177
- [ ] https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/30722

body:
> I am thinking it would be done easiest (and best) - by simply copying the "field headers" from "repo issue view" - which allows filtering on them ?

Not that simple (see https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/pull/26661#issuecomment-2525450748), will try to add the initial support (if we could catch 1.23 milestone)

issue.title: Add label/author/assignee filters to the user/org home issue list

issue.body:
Replace #26661, fix #25979

Not perfect, but usable and much better than before. Since it is quite complex, I am not quite sure whether there would be any regression, if any, I will fix in first time.

I have tested the related pages many times: issue list, milestone issue list, project view, user issue list, org issue list.

<details>

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/80895a42-5f2d-4bba-a4f1-ac372ad55760)

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e6aa4861-f5e8-4084-8bd5-b7ae7d2f54f0)

</details>
